word: DWELL ON HIS COMING.\97Dwell on present truth, on Christ\92s second coming. The Lord is coming very soon. We have only a little while in which to present the truth for this time\97the truth that is to convert souls. This truth is to be presented in the utmost simplicity, even as Christ presented it, so that the people can understand what is truth. Truth will dispel the clouds of error.\97Letter 175, 1904 quoted in Ev 624.
